scripts.preview: npm run setup:firewall && npm run upnp:start && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=3001 HOST=0.0.0.0 DEBUG=app:* concurrently -k "node src/server/index.js" "vite preview --port 8082 --host" "node verify-network.js"
scripts.dev:external: npm run setup:firewall && npm run upnp:start && cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=3001 HOST=0.0.0.0 DEBUG=app:* concurrently -k "node src/server/index.js" "vite --port 8082 --host --force --clearScreen false" "node verify-network.js"
scripts.start:server: cross-env PORT=3001 HOST=0.0.0.0 NODE_ENV=production node src/server/index.js
scripts.preview:full: npm run build && npm run setup:firewall && npm run upnp:start && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=3001 HOST=0.0.0.0 DEBUG=app:* concurrently -k "npm run start:server" "vite preview --port 8082 --host" "node verify-network.js"
